---id:   /Requirements/01-Syntax/identifier/01-l
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/837df2bd-183e-41c0-848b-be88187512da
<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
	<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
		<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); ">
			<p>
				<b><span lang="EN-US">package&nbsp;</span></b>identifier<br />
				<b>public</b><br />
				<b>&nbsp; data</b>&nbsp;v<br />
				<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; end&nbsp;</span></b>v;<br />
				<b>end&nbsp;</b>identifier;&nbsp;</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>

		<p>
			<b><span lang="EN-US">package&nbsp;</span></b>identifier<br />
			<b>private</b><br />
			<b>&nbsp; data</b>&nbsp;valid_identifier<br />
			<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; end&nbsp;</span></b>valid_identifier;<br />
			<b>end&nbsp;</b>identifier;</p>
	</div>

---id:   /Requirements/01-Syntax/identifier/01-l-ulN

<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
	<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
		<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); ">
			<p>
				<b><span lang="EN-US">package&nbsp;</span></b>identifier<br />
				<b>private</b><br />
				<b>&nbsp; data</b>&nbsp;a_b_c_d_e_f_g_h_i_j_k_l_m_n_o_p_r_q_s_t_u_v_w_x_y_z_0_1_2_3_4_5_6_7_8_9<br />
				<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; end&nbsp;</span></b>a_b_c_d_e_f_g_h_i_j_k_l_m_n_o_p_r_q_s_t_u_v_w_x_y_z_0_1_2_3_4_5_6_7_8_9;<br />
				<b>end&nbsp;</b>identifier;&nbsp;</p>
		</div>

---id:   /Requirements/01-Syntax/identifier/02-d-l
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/837df2bd-183e-41c0-848b-be88187512da
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
	<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
		<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
			<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); ">
				<p>
					<b><span lang="EN-US">package&nbsp;</span></b>identifier<br />
					<b>public</b><br />
					&nbsp; -- Invalid identifier: digit cannot be first<br />
					<b>&nbsp; data</b>&nbsp;4v<br />
					<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; end </span></b><span lang="EN-US">4</span>v;<br />
					<b>end&nbsp;</b>identifier;&nbsp;</p>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
&nbsp;
---id:   /Requirements/01-Syntax/identifier/02-l-u-l-u
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/837df2bd-183e-41c0-848b-be88187512da
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
	<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
		<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
			<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); ">
				<p>
					<b><span lang="EN-US">package&nbsp;</span></b>identifier<br />
					<b>public</b><br />
					&nbsp; -- Invalid identifier: underscore cannot be in the end<br />
					<b>&nbsp; data</b>&nbsp;f_9_<br />
					<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; end&nbsp;</span></b>f_9_;<br />
					<b>end&nbsp;</b>identifier;&nbsp;</p>
				<div>
					&nbsp;</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
&nbsp;
---id:   /Requirements/01-Syntax/identifier/02-l-u-u-l
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/837df2bd-183e-41c0-848b-be88187512da
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
	<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
		<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
			<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
				<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); ">
					<p>
						<b><span lang="EN-US">package&nbsp;</span></b>identifier<br />
						<b>public</b><br />
						&nbsp; -- Invalid identifier: two underscores cannot be togather<br />
						<b>&nbsp; data</b>&nbsp;a__b<br />
						<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; end&nbsp;</span></b>a__b;<br />
						<b>end&nbsp;</b>identifier; &nbsp;</p>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

	&nbsp;</p>

--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
	<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">

			<p>
				<b><span lang="EN-US">package&nbsp;</span></b>identifier<br />
				<b>private</b><br />
				&nbsp; -- Invalid identifier: underscore cannot be the first<br />
				<b>&nbsp; data</b>&nbsp;_s<br />
				<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; end&nbsp;</span></b>_s;<br />
				<b>end&nbsp;</b>identifier;&nbsp;</p>

		<div>
			&nbsp; Access_Right33 &nbsp;: MyProp::Access_Rights2 <strong>applies to</strong> (package);<span class="Apple-tab-span" style="white-space:pre"> </span></div>
		<div>
			<strong>end</strong> MyProp;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp;</div>
		<div>
			<strong>package</strong> package_spec</div>
		<div>
			<strong>&nbsp; private</strong></div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; <strong>with</strong> MyProp;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; <strong>data</strong> Bool_Type</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; <strong>end</strong> Bool_Type;</div>
		<div>
			<strong>&nbsp; properties</strong></div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right1 =&gt; read_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right2 =&gt; write_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right3 =&gt; read_write2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right4 =&gt; read_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right5 =&gt; write_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right6 =&gt; read_write2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right7 =&gt; read_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right8 =&gt; write_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right9 =&gt; read_write2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right10 =&gt; read_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right11 =&gt; read_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right12 =&gt; write_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right13 =&gt; read_write2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right14 =&gt; read_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right15 =&gt; write_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right16 =&gt; read_write2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right17 =&gt; read_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right18 =&gt; write_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right19 =&gt; read_write2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right20 =&gt; read_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right21 =&gt; read_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right22 =&gt; write_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right23 =&gt; read_write2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right24 =&gt; read_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right25 =&gt; write_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right26 =&gt; read_write2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right27 =&gt; read_only2;</div>
		<div>
			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right28 =&gt; write_only2;</div>
		<div>

			&nbsp; &nbsp; MyProp::Access_Right33 =&gt; read_only2;</div>
		<div>

<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); ">
	<p>
		<b><span lang="EN-US">package&nbsp;</span></b>package_spec<br />
		<b>private</b><br />
		<b>&nbsp; data</b>&nbsp;Bool_Type<br />
		<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; end&nbsp;</span></b>Bool_Type;<br />
		<b>end&nbsp;</b>package_spec;</p>
</div>

---id:   /Requirements/01-Syntax/package_spec/01-no-pri-none
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/fb328993-1080-47be-847c-fc75d0bbf635
<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
	<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
		<p class="ExampleText" style="page-break-after: avoid; ">
			<b><span lang="EN-US">package&nbsp;</span></b><span lang="EN-US">package_spec</span><br />
			<b><span lang="EN-US">private</span></b><br />
			<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; data</span></b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;Bool_Type</span><br />
			<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; end&nbsp;</span></b><span lang="EN-US">Bool_Type;</span><br />
			<b><span lang="EN-US">properties</span></b><br />
			&nbsp; <strong>none</strong>;<br />
			<b><span lang="EN-US">end&nbsp;</span></b><span lang="EN-US">package_spec</span><span lang="EN-US">;</span></p>
	</div>
</div>
&nbsp;
---id:   /Requirements/01-Syntax/package_spec/01-pub-no-bsa1
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/fb328993-1080-47be-847c-fc75d0bbf635
<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
	<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
		<p class="ExampleText" style="page-break-after: avoid; ">
			<strong>property set</strong> MyProp <strong>is</strong><br />
			&nbsp; Access_Rights3 : <strong>type enumeration</strong> (read_only2, write_only2, read_write2);<br />
			&nbsp; Pckg_Access_Right &nbsp;: MyProp::Access_Rights3&nbsp;<strong>applies to</strong> (<strong>package</strong>);<br />
			<strong>end</strong> MyProp;</p>
		<p class="ExampleText" style="page-break-after: avoid; ">
			<b><span lang="EN-US">package&nbsp;</span></b><span lang="EN-US">package_spec</span><br />
			<b><span lang="EN-US">public<br />
			&nbsp; with</span></b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;MyProp;</span><br />
			<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; data</span></b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;Bool_Type</span><br />
			<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; end&nbsp;</span></b><span lang="EN-US">Bool_Type;<br />
			<strong>properties</strong><br />
			&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MyProp::Pckg_Access_Right =&gt; read_only2;<br />
			<strong>end</strong>&nbsp;package_spec</span><span lang="EN-US">;</span></p>
	</div>
</div>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/01-Syntax/package_spec/01-pub-no-no
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/fb328993-1080-47be-847c-fc75d0bbf635
<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
	<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
		<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
			<p class="ExampleText" style="page-break-after: avoid; ">
				<b><span lang="EN-US">package&nbsp;</span></b><span lang="EN-US">package_spec</span><br />
				<b><span lang="EN-US">public</span></b><br />
				<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; data</span></b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;Bool_Type</span><br />
				<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; end&nbsp;</span></b><span lang="EN-US">Bool_Type;</span><br />
				<b><span lang="EN-US">end&nbsp;</span></b><span lang="EN-US">package_spec</span><span lang="EN-US">;</span></p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>

<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
	<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
		<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">

				<p class="ExampleText" style="page-break-after: avoid; ">
					<br />
					<strong>property set</strong>&nbsp;MyProp&nbsp;<strong>is</strong><br />
					&nbsp; Access_Rights3 :&nbsp;<strong>type enumeration</strong>&nbsp;(read_only2, write_only2, read_write2);<br />
					&nbsp; Pckg_Access_Right1 &nbsp;: MyProp::Access_Rights3&nbsp;<strong>applies to</strong>&nbsp;(<strong>package</strong>);<br />
					&nbsp; Pckg_Access_Right2 &nbsp;: MyProp::Access_Rights3&nbsp;<strong>applies to</strong>&nbsp;(<strong>package</strong>);<br />
					<strong>end</strong>&nbsp;MyProp;</p>
				<p class="ExampleText" style="page-break-after: avoid; ">
					<b><span lang="EN-US">package&nbsp;</span></b><span lang="EN-US">package_spec</span><br />
					<b><span lang="EN-US">public<br />
					&nbsp; with</span></b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;MyProp;</span><br />
					<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; data</span></b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;Bool_Type</span><br />
					<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; end&nbsp;</span></b><span lang="EN-US">Bool_Type;<br />
					<strong><b><span lang="EN-US">private</span></b></strong><br />
					<span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong>data</strong>&nbsp;Priv_Bool_Type</span><br />
					<span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; <strong>end</strong>&nbsp;Priv_Bool_Type;</span><br />
					<strong>properties</strong><br />
					&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MyProp::Pckg_Access_Right1 =&gt; read_only2;<br />
					&nbsp; &nbsp;MyProp::Pckg_Access_Right2 =&gt; write_only2;<br />
					<strong>end</strong>&nbsp;package_spec</span><span lang="EN-US">;</span></p>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
PACKAGE pack_id1::pack<br />
PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feature group GPSbasic_socket<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;end GPSbasic_socket_X; -- bug SC0001&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature group GPSextended_socket extends GPSbasic_socket<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;end GPSextended_socket_X; -- bug SC0001<br />
END pack_id1::pack; 
---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0001/AADL-8.2-ABSENT/02-pos
PACKAGE pack_id1::pack<br />
PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feature group GPSbasic_socket<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;end GPSbasic_socket; -- no bug SC0001&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature group GPSextended_socket extends GPSbasic_socket<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;end GPSextended_socket; -- no bug SC0001<br />
END pack_id1::pack; 
---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0002/01-neg
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/0a3bad98-ef26-4019-b2d8-ab7d357309db
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/a7f403e0-8108-44ea-a861-ddc5658fb98b
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- Two public or private sections are declared for the same package. Bug SC0002.<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE pack<br />
	PUBLIC -- bug SC0002&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; THREAD myThr</p>
&nbsp; END myThr;
<p>
	<br />
	END pack;<br />
	<br />
	-- second public section declaration of the package<br />
	PACKAGE pack<br />
	PUBLIC -- bug SC0002</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; THREAD myThr2</p>
&nbsp; END myThr2;
<p>
	<br />
	PRIVATE -- bug SC0002&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; THREAD myThr3</p>
&nbsp; END myThr3;
<p>
	<br />
	END pack;<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE pack2<br />
	PUBLIC -- bug SC0002</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; THREAD myThr4</p>
&nbsp; END myThr4;
<p>
	<br />
	PRIVATE -- bug SC0002&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; THREAD myThr5</p>
&nbsp; END myThr5;
<p>
	<br />
	END pack2;<br />
	<br />
	-- second private package declaration of the package<br />
	PACKAGE pack<br />
	PRIVATE -- bug SC0002&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; THREAD myThr6</p>
&nbsp; END myThr6;
<p>
	<br />
	END pack;<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE pack2<br />
	PUBLIC -- bug SC0002</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; THREAD myThr7</p>
&nbsp; END myThr7;
<p>
	<br />
	PRIVATE -- bug SC0002&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; THREAD myThr8</p>
&nbsp; END myThr8;
<p>
	<br />
	END pack2;<br />
	<br />
	&nbsp;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0002/02-pos
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/0a3bad98-ef26-4019-b2d8-ab7d357309db
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/a7f403e0-8108-44ea-a861-ddc5658fb98b
<p>
	-- Packages do not contain duplicate package sections. No bug SC0002.<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE pack3<br />
	PUBLIC&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; THREAD myThr</p>
&nbsp; END myThr;
<p>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;<br />
	PRIVATE</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; THREAD myThr2</p>
&nbsp; END myThr2;
<p>
	<br />
	END pack3;<br />
	<br />
	-- public &amp; private sections of the package are declared in two separate package declarations<br />
	PACKAGE pack4<br />
	PRIVATE</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; THREAD myThr3</p>
&nbsp; END myThr3;
<p>
	<br />
	END pack4;<br />
	<br />
	-- public &amp; private sections of the package are declared in two separate package declarations<br />
	PACKAGE pack4<br />
	PUBLIC&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; THREAD myThr4</p>
&nbsp; END myThr4;
<p>
	<br />
	END pack4;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0005/AADL-4.5-L7/01-neg
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/ba1ee5d8-ccb2-4480-8188-da7a115b516f
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
-- Some dimensions of an array of subcomponents are specified, some arn&#39;t. Bug SC0005.<br />
<br />
PACKAGE TC1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROCESS myProcessT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END myProcessT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA myDataT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END myDataT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD myThreadT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END myThreadT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH myPropSet;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROCESS IMPLEMENTATION myProcessT.myProcessImpl&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- numeric dimension size<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myDataSubc : data myDataT [2][][3]; -- bug SC0005<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- user defined property constant as dimension size<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myDataSubc2 : data myDataT [ ][myPropSet::myPropConst][ ]; -- bug SC0005<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- predefined property constant as dimension size<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myThreadSubc : thread myThreadT [5][myPropSet::myPropConst][3][]; -- bug SC0005<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- property as dimension size&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myThreadSubc2 : thread myThreadT [myPropSet::dimension][][]; -- bug SC0005&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END myProcessT.myProcessImpl;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
END TC1;<br />
<br />
PROPERTY SET myPropSet IS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pack;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;dimension : AADLINTEGER =&gt; 4 APPLIES TO (subcomponent);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myPropConst : CONSTANT AADLINTEGER =&gt; 10;<br />
END myPropSet; 
---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0005/AADL-4.5-L7/02-pos
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/ba1ee5d8-ccb2-4480-8188-da7a115b516f
-- All dimensions of an array of subcomponents are specified or all unspecified.&nbsp; No bug SC0005.<br />
PACKAGE TC2<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROCESS myProcessT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;featureArr : IN DATA PORT [];&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END myProcessT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA myDataT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END myDataT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD myThreadT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;featureArr : IN DATA PORT [3];<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END myThreadT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH myPropSet;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROCESS IMPLEMENTATION myProcessT.myProcessImpl&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- all dimension sizes are specified using allowed identifier types and a numeric value<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myDataSubc : data myDataT [myPropSet::myPropConst][4][myPropSet::dimension];<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- all dimension sizes aren&#39;t specified<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myThreadSubc : thread myThreadT [][][];<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- specified size of a single dimension &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myThreadSubc2 : thread myThreadT [4];<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- unspecified size of a single dimension<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myDataSubc2 : data myDataT [];<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END myProcessT.myProcessImpl;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
END TC2;<br />
<br />
PROPERTY SET myPropSet IS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pack;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;dimension : AADLINTEGER =&gt; 4 APPLIES TO (subcomponent);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myPropConst : CONSTANT AADLINTEGER =&gt; 10;<br />
END myPropSet;

<p>
	-- An ABSTRACT component type is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
	-- The subclauses contain declarations. No bug SC0006.<br />
	PACKAGE ABSTRACT_TYPE_TC1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH simplePropSet;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ABSTRACT T<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inDataPort : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outDataPort : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowPath : FLOW PATH inDataPort -&gt; outDataPort;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;initMode : INITIAL mode;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTIES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 1;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ABSTRACT TExt<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS T&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inDataPort2 : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outDataPort2 : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowPath2 : FLOW PATH inDataPort2 -&gt; outDataPort2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;initMode2 : INITIAL mode;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTIES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END TExt;<br />
	END ABSTRACT_TYPE_TC1;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PROPERTY SET simplePropSet IS</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; simpleProp : AADLINTEGER =&gt; 0 APPLIES TO (ABSTRACT);<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simpleProp2 : AADLINTEGER =&gt; 0 APPLIES TO (ABSTRACT);<br />
	END simplePropSet;</p>

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ABSTRACT TExt<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS T&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />

--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1112f58a-380f-465a-8ad0-138157fbf64a

<p>
	-- An ABSTRACT implementation is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
	-- The subclauses contain declarations. No bug SC0006.<br />
	PACKAGE ABSTRACT_IMPLEMENTATION_TC1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH simplePropSet;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM simpleProg</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END simpleProg;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ABSTRACT T<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outDataPort : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outEventPort : OUT EVENT PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inEventPort : IN EVENT PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outDataPort;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ABSTRACT IMPLEMENTATION T.I<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myProgSubc : SUBPROGRAM simpleProg;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CALLS myCalls : {<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;subprogCall : SUBPROGRAM myProgSubc;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;};<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CONNECTIONS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myConnection : PORT outEventPort -&gt; inEventPort;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outDataPort;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;initMode : INITIAL MODE;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTIES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 1;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T.I;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ABSTRACT IMPLEMENTATION T.IExt<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS T.I<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myProgSubc2 : SUBPROGRAM simpleProg;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CALLS myCalls2 : {<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;subprogCall2 : SUBPROGRAM myProgSubc2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;};<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CONNECTIONS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myConnection2 : PORT outEventPort -&gt; inEventPort;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource2 : FLOW SOURCE outDataPort;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode2 : MODE;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTIES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T.IExt;<br />
	END ABSTRACT_IMPLEMENTATION_TC1;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PROPERTY SET simplePropSet IS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simpleProp : AADLINTEGER =&gt; 0 APPLIES TO (ABSTRACT);<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simpleProp2 : AADLINTEGER =&gt; 0 APPLIES TO (ABSTRACT);<br />
	END simplePropSet;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0006/AADL-4.6-L3/02-pos
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1112f58a-380f-465a-8ad0-138157fbf64a
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/7ee05543-f4c6-43fa-be6d-b093c21faa9e
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/fc1121b7-011d-4bff-9f3a-136e2a8a1d14
<p>
	-- An ABSTRACT implementation is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
	-- The subclauses contain the none statement. No bug SC0006.<br />
	PACKAGE ABSTRACT_IMPLEMENTATION_TC2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ABSTRACT T&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ABSTRACT IMPLEMENTATION T.I<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CALLS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CONNECTIONS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T.I;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ABSTRACT IMPLEMENTATION T.IExt<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS T.I<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CONNECTIONS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />

	END ABSTRACT_IMPLEMENTATION_TC2;</p>

<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feature1 : OUT FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feature2 : OUT FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;reqSubpFeature : REQUIRES SUBPROGRAM ACCESS simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;reqSubpFeature2 : REQUIRES SUBPROGRAM ACCESS simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; flowSource : FLOW SOURCE feature1;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource2 : FLOW SOURCE feature2;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END T;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- A SUBPROGRAM component type is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- The subclauses contain declarations. No bug SC0006.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PACKAGE SUBPROGRAM_TYPE_TC1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WITH simplePropSet;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM T<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; outEventDataPort : OUT EVENT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; flowSrc : FLOW SOURCE outEventDataPort;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; initMode : INITIAL mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PROPERTIES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 1;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END T;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM TExt<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; EXTENDS T&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; outEventDataPort2 : OUT EVENT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; flowSrc2 : FLOW SOURCE outEventDataPort2;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MODES<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END TExt;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END SUBPROGRAM_TYPE_TC1;<br />

	-- A SUBPROGRAM component type is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
	-- The subclauses contain the none statement. No bug SC0006.<br />
	PACKAGE SUBPROGRAM_TYPE_TC2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM T<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTIES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM TExt<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS T&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- A SUBPROGRAM implementation is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- The subclauses contain declarations. No bug SC0006.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PACKAGE SUBPROGRAM_IMPLEMENTATION_TC1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WITH simplePropSet;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM simpleProg<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END simpleProg;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; DATA simpleData<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END simpleData;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM T<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; outEventDataPort : OUT EVENT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outEventDataPort2 : OUT EVENT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inParam : IN PARAMETER simpleData;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inParam2 : IN PARAMETER simpleData;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outParam : OUT PARAMETER simpleData;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outParam2 : OUT PARAMETER simpleData;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; flowSrc : FLOW SOURCE outEventDataPort;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSrc2 : FLOW SOURCE outEventDataPort2;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END T;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM IMPLEMENTATION T.I<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; myDataSubc : DATA simpleData;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CALLS myCalls : {<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; subprogCall : SUBPROGRAM simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; };<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CONNECTIONS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; myConnection : PARAMETER inParam -&gt; outParam;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; flowSrc : FLOW SOURCE outEventDataPort;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; initMode : INITIAL MODE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PROPERTIES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 1;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END T.I;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM IMPLEMENTATION T.IExt<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; EXTENDS T.I<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; myDataSubc2 : Data simpleData;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CALLS myCalls2 : {<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; subprogCall2 : SUBPROGRAM simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; };<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CONNECTIONS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; myConnection2 : PARAMETER inParam2 -&gt; outParam2;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; flowSrc2 : FLOW SOURCE outEventDataPort2;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mode2 : MODE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PROPERTIES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 2;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END T.IExt;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END SUBPROGRAM_IMPLEMENTATION_TC1;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTY SET simplePropSet IS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; simpleProp : AADLINTEGER =&gt; 0 APPLIES TO (SUBPROGRAM);<br />

--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- A SUBPROGRAM GROUP implementation is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- The subclauses contain declarations. Bug SC0006.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PACKAGE SUBPROGRAM_GROUP_IMPLEMENTATION_TC1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WITH simplePropSet;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM simpleProg<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END simpleProg;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA simpleDataT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;reqSubpFeature : REQUIRES SUBPROGRAM ACCESS simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;reqSubpFeature2 : REQUIRES SUBPROGRAM ACCESS simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END simpleDataT;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM GROUP T<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feature1 : OUT FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feature2 : OUT FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;reqSubpFeature : REQUIRES SUBPROGRAM ACCESS simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;reqSubpFeature2 : REQUIRES SUBPROGRAM ACCESS simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; flowSource : FLOW SOURCE feature1; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource2 : FLOW SOURCE feature2;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END T;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM GROUP IMPLEMENTATION T.I<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; myProgSubc : SUBPROGRAM simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myDataSubc : DATA simpleDataT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CALLS myCalls : { -- bug SC0006.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; subprogCall : SUBPROGRAM simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; };<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CONNECTIONS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; myConnection : SUBPROGRAM ACCESS reqSubpFeature -&gt; myDataSubc.reqSubpFeature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FLOWS -- bug SC0006.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; flowSource : FLOW SOURCE feature1;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MODES&nbsp; -- bug SC0006.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; initMode : INITIAL MODE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PROPERTIES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 1;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END T.I;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM GROUP IMPLEMENTATION T.IExt<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; EXTENDS T.I<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; myProgSubc2 : SUBPROGRAM simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;myDataSubc2 : DATA simpleDataT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CALLS myCalls2 : { -- bug SC0006.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; subprogCall2 : SUBPROGRAM simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; };<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CONNECTIONS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; myConnection2 : SUBPROGRAM ACCESS reqSubpFeature2 -&gt; myDataSubc2.reqSubpFeature2;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FLOWS -- bug SC0006.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; flowSource2 : FLOW SOURCE feature2;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MODES -- bug SC0006.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mode2 : MODE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PROPERTIES<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END T.IExt;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END SUBPROGRAM_GROUP_IMPLEMENTATION_TC1;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTY SET simplePropSet IS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; simpleProp : AADLINTEGER =&gt; 0 APPLIES TO (SUBPROGRAM GROUP);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; simpleProp2 : AADLINTEGER =&gt; 0 APPLIES TO (SUBPROGRAM GROUP);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END simplePropSet;<br />

-- A SUBPROGRAM GROUP implementation is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
-- The subclauses contain the none statement. No bug SC0006.<br />
PACKAGE SUBPROGRAM_GROUP_IMPLEMENTATION_TC2<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM GROUP T&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CALLS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CONNECTIONS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTIES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T.I;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

<p>
	-- A THREAD component type is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
	-- The subclauses contain declarations. No bug SC0006.<br />
	PACKAGE THREAD_TYPE_TC1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH simplePropSet;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD T<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inDataPort : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outDataPort : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowPath : FLOW PATH inDataPort -&gt; outDataPort;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;initMode : INITIAL mode;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTIES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 1;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD TExt<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS T&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inDataPort2 : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outDataPort2 : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowPath2 : FLOW PATH inDataPort2 -&gt; outDataPort2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;initMode2 : INITIAL mode;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTIES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END TExt;<br />
	END THREAD_TYPE_TC1;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PROPERTY SET simplePropSet IS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simpleProp : AADLINTEGER =&gt; 0 APPLIES TO (THREAD);<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simpleProp2 : AADLINTEGER =&gt; 0 APPLIES TO (THREAD);<br />
	END simplePropSet;</p>

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- A THREAD implementation is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- The subclauses contain declarations. No bug SC0006.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PACKAGE THREAD_IMPLEMENTATION_TC1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WITH simplePropSet;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM simpleProg<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END simpleProg;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; DATA simpleData<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END simpleData;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; THREAD T<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; outDataPort : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; outDataPort2 : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; outDataPort3 : OUT DATA PORT simpleData;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; inDataPort3 : IN DATA PORT simpleData;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; outDataPort4 : OUT DATA PORT simpleData;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; inDataPort4 : IN DATA PORT simpleData;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outDataPort;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource2 : FLOW SOURCE outDataPort2;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END T;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; THREAD IMPLEMENTATION T.I<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; myProgSubc : SUBPROGRAM simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CALLS myCalls : {<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; subprogCall : SUBPROGRAM simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; };<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CONNECTIONS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; myConnection : PORT inDataPort3 -&gt; outDataPort3;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outDataPort;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; initMode : INITIAL MODE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PROPERTIES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 1;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END T.I;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; THREAD IMPLEMENTATION T.IExt<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; EXTENDS T.I<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mode2 : MODE;<br />

	-- A THREAD GROUP component type is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
	-- The subclauses contain declarations. No bug SC0006.<br />
	PACKAGE THREAD_GROUP_TYPE_TC1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH simplePropSet;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD GROUP T<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inDataPort : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outDataPort : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowPath : FLOW PATH inDataPort -&gt; outDataPort;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;initMode : INITIAL mode;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTIES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 1;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD GROUP TExt<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS T&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inDataPort2 : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outDataPort2 : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />

	-- A PROCESS component type is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
	-- The subclauses contain declarations. No bug SC0006.<br />
	PACKAGE PROCESS_TYPE_TC1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH simplePropSet;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROCESS T<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inDataPort : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outDataPort : OUT DATA PORT;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowPath : FLOW PATH inDataPort -&gt; outDataPort;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;initMode : INITIAL mode;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROCESS TExt<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS T&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inDataPort2 : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- A PROCESSOR implementation is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- The subclauses contain declarations. Bug SC0006.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PACKAGE PROCESSOR_IMPLEMENTATION_TC1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WITH simplePropSet;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBPROGRAM simpleProg<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END simpleProg;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;BUS simpleBus<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END simpleBus;<br />
<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PROCESSOR T<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; outDataPort : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; outEventPort : OUT EVENT PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; inEventPort : IN EVENT PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FLOWS<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END T;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PROCESSOR IMPLEMENTATION T.I<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBCOMPONENTS<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FLOWS<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END T.I;<br />

<p>
	-- A VIRTUAL_PROCESSOR component type is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
	-- The subclauses contain declarations. No bug SC0006.<br />
	PACKAGE VIRTUAL_PROCESSOR_TYPE_TC1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH simplePropSet;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;VIRTUAL PROCESSOR T<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inDataPort : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outDataPort : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowPath : FLOW PATH inDataPort -&gt; outDataPort;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;initMode : INITIAL mode;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTIES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 1;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;VIRTUAL PROCESSOR TExt<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS T&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inDataPort2 : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outDataPort2 : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowPath2 : FLOW PATH inDataPort2 -&gt; outDataPort2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;initMode2 : INITIAL mode;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTIES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END TExt;<br />
	END VIRTUAL_PROCESSOR_TYPE_TC1;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PROPERTY SET simplePropSet IS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simpleProp : AADLINTEGER =&gt; 0 APPLIES TO (VIRTUAL PROCESSOR);<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simpleProp2 : AADLINTEGER =&gt; 0 APPLIES TO (VIRTUAL PROCESSOR);<br />
	END simplePropSet;</p>

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />

	-- A DEVICE component type is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
	-- The subclauses contain declarations. No bug SC0006.<br />
	PACKAGE DEVICE_TYPE_TC1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH simplePropSet;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DEVICE T<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inDataPort : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outDataPort : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowPath : FLOW PATH inDataPort -&gt; outDataPort;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;initMode : INITIAL mode;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTIES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 1;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DEVICE TExt<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS T&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inDataPort2 : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outDataPort2 : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowPath2 : FLOW PATH inDataPort2 -&gt; outDataPort2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;initMode2 : INITIAL mode;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTIES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END TExt;<br />
	END DEVICE_TYPE_TC1;</p>

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;-- A DEVICE implementation is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END simpleBus;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; DEVICE T<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; outDataPort : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; outEventPort : OUT EVENT PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; inEventPort : IN EVENT PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outDataPort;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END T;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; DEVICE IMPLEMENTATION T.I<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SUBCOMPONENTS<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CALLS myCalls : { -- bug SC0006.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; subprogCall : SUBPROGRAM simpleProg;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; };<br />

	-- A SYSTEM component type is declared with all subclauses specified.<br />
	-- The subclauses contain declarations. No bug SC0006.<br />
	PACKAGE SYSTEM_TYPE_TC1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH simplePropSet;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SYSTEM T<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inDataPort : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outDataPort : OUT DATA PORT;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowPath : FLOW PATH inDataPort -&gt; outDataPort;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;initMode : INITIAL mode;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROPERTIES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;simplePropSet::simpleProp =&gt; 1;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END T;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SYSTEM TExt<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS T&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inDataPort2 : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; inInverseFeatureGroup: IN FEATURE GROUP INVERSE OF outFeatureGroupT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; filledInverseFeatureGroup: FEATURE GROUP INVERSE OF filledFeatureGroupT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END systemT_2;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SYSTEM systemT_2_Ext<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; EXTENDS systemT_2<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FEATURES<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END dataT.dataImplExt;<br />

	END DataPack;</p>

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM GROUP subprogramGroupT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramGroupT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SYSTEM systemT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END systemT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD GROUP threadGroupT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadGroupT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;VIRTUAL BUS virtualBusT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END virtualBusT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;VIRTUAL PROCESSOR virtualProcessorT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END virtualProcessorT;<br />
	END CTP;</p>

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;subprogramGroupSubc : SUBPROGRAM GROUP CTP::subprogramGroupT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;systemSubc : SYSTEM CTP::systemT; -- bug SC0008<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END processT.processImpl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROCESS IMPLEMENTATION processT.processImpl2&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
