	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;abstractSubc : ABSTRACT CTP::abstractT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;busSubc : BUS CTP::busT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;dataSubc : DATA CTP::dataT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;deviceSubc : DEVICE CTP::deviceT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;memorySubc : MEMORY CTP::memoryT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;processSubc : PROCESS CTP::processT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;processorSubc : PROCESSOR CTP::processorT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;subprogramSubc : SUBPROGRAM CTP::subprogramT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;subprogramGroupSubc : SUBPROGRAM GROUP CTP::subprogramGroupT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;systemSubc : SYSTEM CTP::systemT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;threadSubc : THREAD CTP::threadT; -- bug SC0008<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;threadGroupSubc : THREAD GROUP CTP::threadGroupT; -- bug SC0008<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;virtualBusSubc : VIRTUAL BUS CTP::virtualBusT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;virtualProcessorSubc : VIRTUAL PROCESSOR CTP::virtualProcessorT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END systemT.systemImpl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SYSTEM IMPLEMENTATION systemT.systemImpl2&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END systemT.systemImpl2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SYSTEM IMPLEMENTATION systemT.systemImpl3<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END systemT.systemImpl3;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SYSTEM IMPLEMENTATION systemT.systemImplExt<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS systemT.systemImpl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;abstractSubc : REFINED TO ABSTRACT CTP::abstractT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;busSubc : REFINED TO BUS CTP::busT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;dataSubc : REFINED TO DATA CTP::dataT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;deviceSubc : REFINED TO DEVICE CTP::deviceT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;memorySubc : REFINED TO MEMORY CTP::memoryT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;processSubc : REFINED TO PROCESS CTP::processT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;processorSubc : REFINED TO PROCESSOR CTP::processorT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;subprogramSubc : REFINED TO SUBPROGRAM CTP::subprogramT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;subprogramGroupSubc : REFINED TO SUBPROGRAM GROUP CTP::subprogramGroupT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;systemSubc : REFINED TO SYSTEM CTP::systemT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;threadSubc : REFINED TO THREAD CTP::threadT; -- bug SC0008<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;threadGroupSubc : REFINED TO THREAD GROUP CTP::threadGroupT; -- bug SC0008<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;virtualBusSubc : REFINED TO VIRTUAL BUS CTP::virtualBusT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;virtualProcessorSubc : REFINED TO VIRTUAL PROCESSOR CTP::virtualProcessorT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END systemT.systemImplExt;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SYSTEM IMPLEMENTATION systemT.systemImplExt2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS systemT.systemImpl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;none;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END systemT.systemImplExt2;<br />
	END SystemPack;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE CTP<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ABSTRACT abstractT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END abstractT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;BUS busT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END busT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA dataT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END dataT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DEVICE deviceT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END deviceT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MEMORY memoryT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END memoryT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROCESS processT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END processT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROCESSOR processorT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END processorT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM GROUP subprogramGroupT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramGroupT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SYSTEM systemT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END systemT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD GROUP threadGroupT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadGroupT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;VIRTUAL BUS virtualBusT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END virtualBusT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;VIRTUAL PROCESSOR virtualProcessorT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END virtualProcessorT;<br />
	END CTP;</p>

--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
-- A component type declaration declares prototypes, features and flows with the same<br />
-- defining identifier. Bug SC0009.<br />
PACKAGE COMPONENT_TYPE_DECLARATION_TC1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;component_prototype : DATA;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : DATA; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ID_1 : FEATURE; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_prototype : FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : DATA; -- bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_declaration : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : IN DATA PORT; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;in_feature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;out_feature : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_source : FLOW SOURCE out_feature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_sink : FLOW SINK in_feature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : FLOW SOURCE out_feature; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ID_1 : FLOW SINK in_feature; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Id_2 : FLOW SOURCE out_feature; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : INITIAL mode; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;modeTrans : id1 -[inFeature]-&gt; mode3; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id1 -[inFeature]-&gt; mode1;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode3 : mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;modeTrans : mode1 -[inFeature]-&gt; mode3; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 -[inFeature]-&gt; id1;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : mode; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type;<br />
END COMPONENT_TYPE_DECLARATION_TC1;

-- A component type declaration does not declare any prototypes, features and flows with the same<br />
-- defining identifier. No bug SC0009.<br />
PACKAGE COMPONENT_TYPE_DECLARATION_TC2<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;component_prototype : DATA;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_prototype : FEATURE;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_declaration : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;in_feature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;out_feature : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_source : FLOW SOURCE out_feature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_sink : FLOW SINK in_feature;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type;<br />
END COMPONENT_TYPE_DECLARATION_TC2;

--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/a4e9a786-1e12-43ae-a6e6-542cd550fc9e

--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/614d4ad2-53ff-4a9b-9234-08c8bc44b9c9
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/30ac97df-6ded-4c78-b15f-fa437c502b79
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/da197059-8637-4533-ab9d-1f3f02ff5ab0
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/6ddb443b-ba31-4eb3-b48e-baa930a5aa29
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/e3557a93-967f-4e68-a2ef-0be2386328db
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
-- A component type declaration declares modal flow specification declarations which have<br />
-- the same identifier and share a common mode. This component type declaration also<br />
-- declares modal flow specification declarations which have the same identifier, but<br />
-- do not share a common mode. Bug SC0009.<br />
PACKAGE COMPONENT_TYPE_DECLARATION_TC5<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;in_feature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;out_feature : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_source : FLOW SOURCE out_feature IN MODES (mode1, mode2); -- Bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_source : FLOW SOURCE out_feature IN MODES (mode2, mode3); -- Bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_sink : FLOW SINK in_feature IN MODES (mode1, mode2); -- Bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_sink : FLOW SINK in_feature IN MODES (mode3); -- Bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 : INITIAL mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode2 : mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode3 : mode;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type;<br />
END COMPONENT_TYPE_DECLARATION_TC5;

-- A component type extension declares prototypes, features and flows with the same<br />
-- defining identifier. Bug SC0009.<br />
PACKAGE COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_declaration<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_declaration;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_extension<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS thread_type_declaration<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;component_prototype : DATA;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : DATA; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ID_1 : FEATURE; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_prototype : FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : DATA; -- bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_declaration : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : IN DATA PORT; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;in_feature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;out_feature : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_source : FLOW SOURCE out_feature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_sink : FLOW SINK in_feature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : FLOW SOURCE out_feature; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ID_1 : FLOW SINK in_feature; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Id_2 : FLOW SOURCE out_feature; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : INITIAL mode; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;modeTrans : id1 -[inFeature]-&gt; mode3; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id1 -[inFeature]-&gt; mode1;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode3 : mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;modeTrans : mode1 -[inFeature]-&gt; mode3; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : mode; -- bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_extension;<br />
END COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC1;

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_declaration : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;in_feature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;out_feature : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_source : FLOW SOURCE out_feature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_sink : FLOW SINK in_feature;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_extension;<br />
END COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC2;

--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
-- A component type extension declares prototypes, features and flows with the same<br />
-- defining identifier. The extended component type also declares prototypes, features<br />
-- and flows with the same defining identifier. Bug SC0009.<br />
PACKAGE COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC3<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;component_prototype : DATA;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : DATA;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ID_1 : FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_prototype : FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : DATA;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_declaration : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;in_feature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;out_feature : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_source : FLOW SOURCE out_feature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_sink : FLOW SINK in_feature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : FLOW SOURCE out_feature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ID_1 : FLOW SINK in_feature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Id_2 : FLOW SOURCE out_feature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_declaration;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_extension<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS thread_type_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;component_prototype_ext : DATA;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1_ext : DATA; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ID_1_ext : FEATURE; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_prototype_ext: FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2_ext : DATA; -- bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_declaration_ext : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1_ext : IN DATA PORT; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;in_feature_ext : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;out_feature_ext : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_source_ext : FLOW SOURCE out_feature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_sink_ext : FLOW SINK in_feature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1_ext : FLOW SOURCE out_feature; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ID_1_ext : FLOW SINK in_feature; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Id_2_ext : FLOW SOURCE out_feature; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_extension;<br />
END COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC3;

<p>
	-- A component type extension declares refinement declarations with the same defining identifier.<br />
	-- It also declares modal flow specification declarations which have the same identifier<br />
	-- and do not share any common modes. Bug SC0009.<br />
	PACKAGE COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC4<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH DATA_TYPES;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;component_prototype : DATA;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id1 : FEATURE;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_declaration : IN DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;in_feature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id2 : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_source : FLOW SOURCE out_feature;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_sink : FLOW SINK in_feature;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_declaration;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_extension<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS thread_type_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;component_prototype : REFINED TO DATA DATA_TYPES::data_type_1; -- Bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id1: REFINED TO IN FEATURE; -- Bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;component_prototype : REFINED TO DATA DATA_TYPES::data_type_2; -- Bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id1 : IN DATA PORT; -- Bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;in_feature : REFINED TO IN DATA PORT DATA_TYPES::data_type_1; -- Bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id2 : REFINED TO OUT DATA PORT DATA_TYPES::data_type_1; -- Bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;in_feature : REFINED TO IN DATA PORT DATA_TYPES::data_type_2; -- Bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_source : REFINED TO FLOW SOURCE IN MODES (mode1, mode2); -- Bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id2 : FLOW SINK id2; -- Bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_source : REFINED TO FLOW SOURCE IN MODES (mode3); -- Bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 : INITIAL mode;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode2 : mode;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode3 : mode;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_extension;<br />
	END COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC4;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE DATA_TYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA data_type_1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END data_type_1;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA data_type_2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END data_type_2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogram_type_1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogram_type_1;<br />
	END DATA_TYPES;</p>

<p>
	-- A component type extension refines a prototype, a feature and a flow. No bug SC0009.<br />
	PACKAGE COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC5<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH DATA_TYPES;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;component_prototype : DATA;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;out_fature : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_source : FLOW SOURCE out_feature;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_declaration;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_extension<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS thread_type_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;component_prototype : REFINED TO DATA DATA_TYPES::data_type_1; -- No bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;out_fature : REFINED TO OUT DATA PORT DATA_TYPES::data_type_1; -- No bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flow_source : REFINED TO FLOW SOURCE IN MODES (mode1, mode2); -- No bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 : INITIAL mode;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode2 : mode;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_extension;<br />
	END COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC5;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE DATA_TYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA data_type_1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END data_type_1;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA data_type_2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END data_type_2;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogram_type_1;<br />

--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/e3557a93-967f-4e68-a2ef-0be2386328db
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- A component type extension refines a declaration, i.e. declares a refinement declaration.<br />
	-- The identifier of the refined declaration is identical to the identifier of another declaration<br />
	-- from the local namespace where the refined declaration is declared.<br />
	-- The refinement declaration has no bug SC0009.<br />
	PACKAGE COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC6<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH DATA_TYPES;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : DATA;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_declaration;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_extension<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS thread_type_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : REFINED TO DATA DATA_TYPES::data_type_1; -- No bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_extension;<br />
	END COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC6;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE DATA_TYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA data_type_1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END data_type_1;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA data_type_2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END data_type_2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogram_type_1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogram_type_1;<br />
	END DATA_TYPES;</p>

<p>
	-- A deep extension hierarchy of component types is represented. The identifier of a declaration<br />
	-- from one of the extensions is identical to the identifier of the base component type declaration.<br />
	-- Bug SC0009.<br />
	PACKAGE COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC7<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH DATA_TYPES;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : DATA;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_declaration;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_extension_1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS thread_type_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_3 : DATA;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_4 : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_extension_1;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_extension_2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS thread_type_extension_1&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_5 : DATA;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_6 : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_extension_2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_extension_3<br />

	-- A deep extension hierarchy of component types is represented. One of the component type extensions<br />
	-- extends a component type which does not exist. No bug SC0009.<br />
	PACKAGE COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC8<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH DATA_TYPES;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />

<p>
	-- A deep extension hierarchy of component types is represented. One of the component type extensions<br />
	-- extends a component type with the category which does not match the category of the extending<br />
	-- component type. No bug SC0009.<br />
	PACKAGE COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC9<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH DATA_TYPES;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SYSTEM system_type_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : DATA;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_extension_1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS system_type_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_3 : DATA;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_4 : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_5 : DATA;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_6 : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

	PACKAGE DATA_TYPES<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA data_type_1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END data_type_1;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA data_type_2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END data_type_2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogram_type_1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogram_type_1;<br />
	END DATA_TYPES;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0009/AADL-4.3-4.4/AADL-4.3/15-neg

PACKAGE COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC10<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : DATA;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_declaration;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD thread_type_extension<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS thread_type_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : DATA; -- Bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : OUT DATA PORT; -- Bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END thread_type_extension;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
END COMPONENT_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC10;

--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
-- The namespace of a component implementation declaration contains several declarations<br />
-- with the same defining identifier. Bug SC0009.<br />
PACKAGE COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC1<br />
PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inFeature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature_2 : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : FLOW SOURCE outFeature_2;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadT.impl<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;componentPrototype : SUBPROGRAM;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : SUBPROGRAM; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;subcomp : SUBPROGRAM GROUP;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ID : SUBPROGRAM GROUP; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CALLS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;callSequence : {call_1 : SUBPROGRAM subcomp; call_2 : SUBPROGRAM subcomp;}; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : {call_1 : SUBPROGRAM subcomp; call_2 : SUBPROGRAM subcomp;}; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;callSequence_2 : {call_1 : SUBPROGRAM subcomp; id : SUBPROGRAM subcomp;}; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CONNECTIONS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;port_connection : PORT inFeaute -&gt; outFeature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : PORT inFeaute -&gt; outFeature; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : FLOW SOURCE outFeature_2; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : INITIAL mode; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode3 -[inFeature]-&gt; mode1;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 : mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;modeTrans : id -[inFeature]-&gt; mode3; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id -[inFeature]-&gt; mode1;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode3 : mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;modeTrans : mode1 -[inFeature]-&gt; mode3; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 -[inFeature]-&gt; id;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.impl;<br />
END COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC1;

-- Two flow implementations with the same identifier are declared to belong to different modes.<br />
-- No bug SC0009. &nbsp;<br />
PACKAGE COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC2<br />
PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inFeature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode1, mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature IN MODES (mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 : INITIAL mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode2 : mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode3 : mode;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadT.impl<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode1); -- No bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature IN MODES (mode2);&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode2); -- No bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.impl;<br />
END COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC2;

-- Two flow implementations are declared to belong to the same mode. No bug SC0009. &nbsp;<br />
PACKAGE COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC3<br />
PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inFeature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode1, mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature IN MODES (mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 : INITIAL mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode2 : mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode3 : mode;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadT.impl<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode1); -- No bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode2, mode3, mode1); -- No bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature IN MODES (mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.impl;<br />
END COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC3;

-- Two flow implementations are declared to belong to the same mode. This mode is not declared, i.e.<br />
-- no such a mode exists. No bug SC0009. &nbsp;<br />
PACKAGE COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC4<br />
PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inFeature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode1, mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature IN MODES (mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 : INITIAL mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode2 : mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode3 : mode;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadT.impl<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode1, mode2, mode4); -- No bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode3, mode4); -- No bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature IN MODES (mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.impl;<br />
END COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC4;

-- The other one does not belong to any modes. No bug SC0009. &nbsp;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inFeature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode1, mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature IN MODES (mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 : INITIAL mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode2 : mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode3 : mode;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode1); -- No bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature; -- No bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature IN MODES (mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.impl;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : SUBPROGRAM;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 : INITIAL mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : mode;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT_ext_1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS threadT_XXX<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;prototype_1 : SUBPROGRAM;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_1 : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT_ext_1;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT_ext_2<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS threadT_ext_1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;prototype_2 : SUBPROGRAM;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_2 : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT_ext_2;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT_ext_3<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS threadT_ext_2<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;prototype_3 : SUBPROGRAM;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_3 : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT_ext_3;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadT_ext_3.impl&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : SUBPROGRAM; -- No bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CONNECTIONS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : PORT inFeaute -&gt; outFeature; -- No bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT_ext_3.impl;<br />
END COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC9;

--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/ea43aa5d-6f67-4237-aac9-2ab6226de306
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/cfab821a-7ef6-4161-939d-26c412e9578b

--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/9c2440a2-7196-4423-87bc-2ee826a6d00a
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/a245361f-71a7-4ecc-bf15-e5a11e9093ff
<p>
	-- A component type declares a flow specification. The implementation of that type declares<br />
	-- a flow implementation for the flow specification. No bug SC0009. &nbsp;<br />
	PACKAGE COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC10<br />
	PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH DATA_TYPES;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inFeature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadT.impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature; -- No bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature; -- No bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.impl;<br />
	END COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC10;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE DATA_TYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA data_type_1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END data_type_1;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA data_type_2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END data_type_2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogram_type_1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogram_type_1;<br />
	END DATA_TYPES;</p>

--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
-- A deep component type extension hierarchy is implemented.<br />
-- One of the component types extends a component type with the category which does<br />
-- not match the category of the extending component type.<br />
-- No bug SC0009.<br />
PACKAGE COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC11<br />
PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SYSTEM systemT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : SUBPROGRAM;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inFeature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 : INITIAL mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : mode;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END systemT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT_ext_1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS systemT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;prototype_1 : SUBPROGRAM;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_1 : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT_ext_1;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT_ext_2<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS threadT_ext_1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;prototype_2 : SUBPROGRAM;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT_ext_2;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS threadT_ext_2<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;prototype_3 : SUBPROGRAM;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_3 : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT_ext_3;<br />

-- A component implementation implements a component type. The categories of both<br />
-- do not match. The component implementation declares some identifiers to be<br />
-- identical to the identifiers declared in the component type. No bug SC0009.<br />

PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SYSTEM systemT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : SUBPROGRAM;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inFeature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 : INITIAL mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : mode;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END systemT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : SUBPROGRAM; -- No bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CONNECTIONS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : PORT inFeaute -&gt; outFeature; -- No bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END systemT.impl;<br />
END COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC12;

-- A component implementation declaration does not contain any non-unique<br />
-- identifiers. The implemented component type does not contain any identifiers.<br />
-- No bug SC0009.<br />
PACKAGE COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC15<br />
PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadT.impl&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : SUBPROGRAM;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : INITIAL MODE;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.impl;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
END COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_DECLARATION_TC15;

--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
-- The namespace of a component implementation extension contains several declarations<br />
-- with the same defining identifier. There are no refinement declarations among them. Bug SC0009.<br />
PACKAGE COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_EXTENSION_TC1<br />
PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inFeature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature_2 : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : FLOW SOURCE outFeature_2;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadT.implExt<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS threadT.impl<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;componentPrototype : SUBPROGRAM;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : SUBPROGRAM; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;subcomp : SUBPROGRAM GROUP;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ID : SUBPROGRAM GROUP; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CALLS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;callSequence : {call_1 : SUBPROGRAM subcomp; call_2 : SUBPROGRAM subcomp;}; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : {call_1 : SUBPROGRAM subcomp; call_2 : SUBPROGRAM subcomp;}; -- bug SC009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;callSequence_2 : {call_1 : SUBPROGRAM subcomp; id : SUBPROGRAM subcomp;}; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CONNECTIONS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;port_connection : PORT inFeaute -&gt; outFeature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : PORT inFeaute -&gt; outFeature; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : FLOW SOURCE outFeature_2; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 : INITIAL mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id -[inFeature]-&gt; mode1;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id : mode; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;modeTrans: mode3 -[inFeature]-&gt; id; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode3 : mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 -[inFeature]-&gt; id;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;modeTrans: mode3 -[inFeature]-&gt; mode1; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.implExt;<br />
END COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_EXTENSION_TC1;

--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- A component implementation extension refines some declarations and declares<br />
	-- new declarations. The identifier of a new declaration is identical to the identifier<br />
	-- of one of the refined declarations. Bug SC0009.<br />
	PACKAGE COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_EXTENSION_TC2<br />
	PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH DATA_TYPES;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inFeatue : IN DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature_2 : OUT DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inFeatue_2 : IN DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadT.impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : SUBPROGRAM;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : SUBPROGRAM;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CONNECTIONS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_3 : PORT inFeaute -&gt; outFeature;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadT.implExt<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS threadT.impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : REFINED TO SUBPROGRAM DATA_TYPES::subprogram_type_1; -- Bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : SUBPROGRAM GROUP; -- Bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBCOMPONENTS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_2 : REFINED TO SUBPROGRAM DATA_TYPES::subprogram_type_1; -- Bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_3 : SUBPROGRAM GROUP; -- Bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;CONNECTIONS<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_3 : PORT inFeaute -&gt; outFeature; -- Bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : PORT inFeaute_2 -&gt; outFeature_2; -- Bug SC0009<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.implExt;<br />
	END COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_EXTENSION_TC2;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE DATA_TYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA data_type_1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END data_type_1;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;DATA data_type_2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END data_type_2;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogram_type_1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogram_type_1;<br />
	END DATA_TYPES;</p>

-- Two flow implementations with the same identifier are declared to belong to different modes.<br />
-- No bug SC0009. &nbsp;<br />
PACKAGE COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_EXTENSION_TC3<br />
PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inFeature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode1, mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature IN MODES (mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 : INITIAL mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode2 : mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode3 : mode;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadT.impl<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.impl;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadT.implExt<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS threadT.impl<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode1); -- No bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature IN MODES (mode2);&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode2); -- No bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.implExt;<br />
END COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_EXTENSION_TC3;

-- Two flow implementations are declared to belong to the same mode. No bug SC0009.<br />
PACKAGE COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_EXTENSION_TC4<br />
PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;inFeature : IN DATA PORT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode1, mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature IN MODES (mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;MODES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode1 : INITIAL mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode2 : mode;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode3 : mode;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadT.impl<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.impl;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadT.implExt<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS threadT.impl<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FLOWS<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode1); -- No bug SC0009&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSource : FLOW SOURCE outFeature IN MODES (mode2, mode3, mode1); -- No bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature IN MODES (mode2);<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.implExt;<br />
END COMPONENT_IMPLEMENTATION_EXTENSION_TC4;

-- no such a mode exists. No bug SC0009. &nbsp;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;outFeature : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;flowSink : FLOW SINK inFeature IN MODES (mode2);<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;mode3 : mode;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT.impl;<br />

-- A feature group type declaration declares prototypes and features with the same defining identifier. Bug SC0009.<br />
PACKAGE FEATURE_GROUP_TYPE_DECLARATION_TC1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP f_group_declaration<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;ID_1 : FEATURE; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_prototype : FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_declaration : IN DATA PORT;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;out_feature : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END f_group_declaration;<br />
