---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0009/AADL-8.2/05-pos
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/52d716ea-c4f4-4539-ae52-0e4256643842
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/87ebb962-ed32-4f6f-b969-b14f79046591
-- A feature group type is declared to be the inversion of another feature group type.<br />
-- Two features declared in different feature groups have the same defining identifier. No bug SC0009.<br />
PACKAGE FEATURE_GROUP_TYPE_DECLARATION_TC5<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP f_group_declaration<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_declaration : IN DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END f_group_declaration;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP inversed_f_group_declaration<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_declaration : OUT DATA PORT; -- No bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;INVERSE OF f_group_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END inversed_f_group_declaration;<br />
END FEATURE_GROUP_TYPE_DECLARATION_TC5;

	-- A feature group type extension does not declare any prototypes and features<br />
	-- with the same defining identifier. No bug SC0009.<br />
	PACKAGE FEATURE_GROUP_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP f_group_declaration<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END f_group_declaration;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP f_group_extension<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS f_group_declaration<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_prototype_ext : FEATURE;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; component_prototype_ext : DATA;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;feature_declaration_ext : IN DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;in_feature_ext : IN DATA PORT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;out_feature_ext : OUT DATA PORT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

-- A feature group type extension declares prototypes and features with the same defining identifier.<br />
-- The extended feature group type declaration also declares prototypes and features.<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : FEATURE; -- bug SC0009<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END f_group_extension;<br />
END FEATURE_GROUP_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC9;

--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/87ebb962-ed32-4f6f-b969-b14f79046591
<p>
	-- A feature group type extension does not contain any non-unique identifiers.<br />
	-- The extended feature group type does not contain any identifiers. No bug SC0009.<br />
	PACKAGE FEATURE_GROUP_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC10<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP f_group_declaration&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END f_group_declaration;</p>

	&nbsp;</p>

	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; DATA simpleDataT</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END simpleDataT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP f_group_extension<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS f_group_declaration<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />

	END FEATURE_GROUP_TYPE_EXTENSION_TC10;</p>

-- implements a component type from the hierarchy and declares identifiers which are identical<br />
-- to identifiers declared in the implemented component type and its ancestors. Bug SC0017 and SC0009.<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS f_group_extension_1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_3 : FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END f_group_extension_2;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP f_group_extension_3<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS f_group_extension_2<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_4 : FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END f_group_extension_3;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP f_group_extension_4<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS f_group_extension_3<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_5 : FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END f_group_extension_4;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
END FEATURE_GROUP_TYPE_TC1;<br />

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0017/05-neg
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
-- A deep extension hierarchy of feature group types is declared. The hierarchy<br />
-- contains a circle of feature group type extensions.<br />
-- A feature group type from the hierarchy declares identifiers which are identical<br />
-- to the identifiers declared in ancestor feature group types. Bugs SC0017 and SC0009.<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP f_group_declaration<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_1 : FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END f_group_declaration;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />

&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END f_group_extension_1;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP f_group_extension_2 -- Bug SC0017<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EXTENDS f_group_extension_1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROTOTYPES<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id_3 : FEATURE;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END f_group_extension_2;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

	-- The identifier listed in the with clause is identical to the identifier of a property set<br />
	-- and to the identifier of a package. No bug SC0023.<br />

	-- contains a component type declaration. Bug SC0024.<br />
	PACKAGE TC1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames pckgId::pckgId::all; -- bug SC0024&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames pckgId::pckgId::all; -- bug SC0024&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC1;</p>

	END pckgId::pckgId;<br />

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0024/02-pos
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- Two aliases rename all declarations of the same package. Two public sections are declared<br />
	-- for the package containing the aliases.<br />
	-- The public section of the referenced package contains a component type declaration.<br />
	-- Bug SC0024 is not detected.<br />
	PACKAGE TC2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames pckgId::pckgId::all; -- bug SC0024 is not detected&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames pckgId::pckgId::all; -- bug SC0024 is not detected&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC2;<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE TC2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; THREAD threadTypeId3<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId3; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br />
	END TC2;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	<br />
	&nbsp;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0024/03-pos
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
-- Two aliases rename all declarations of the containing package.<br />
-- The public section of the containing package contains a feature group declaration.<br />
-- No bug SC0024.<br />
PACKAGE TC3<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames TC3::all; -- No bug SC0024. &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames TC3::all; -- No bug SC0024.<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP fGrId<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END fGrId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
END TC3; 
---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0024/04-pos
-- Two aliases rename all declarations of the containing package.<br />
-- The public section of the containing package does not contain a feature group declaration<br />
-- or a component type declaration. No bug SC0024.<br />
PACKAGE TC4<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames TC4::all; -- No bug SC0024. &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames TC4::all; -- No bug SC0024.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
END TC4; 
---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0024/05-pos
<p>
	-- Two aliases rename all declarations of the same package. The public section of the package<br />
	-- does not contain a component type declaration or feature group declaration. No bug SC0024.<br />
	PACKAGE TC5<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames pckgId::all; -- no bug SC0024&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

	END TC5;</p>

	&nbsp;</p>

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	END pckgId;</p>

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;<br />

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/01-neg
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/f8dca427-55be-45ea-8c0b-2f7cb7df0ccd
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1abb93b3-4d16-414c-a91d-fab263b9adb5
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/e2dba0b6-aef6-493a-aef6-8d2531ba6563
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/79cbe84a-69c9-4e73-97d6-23f06f8f4710
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/9f81b6ee-d435-4158-b51f-5f60c0b1ddd3
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/84ccd78b-e880-4002-93e6-5d97d1c233d9
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/27afcd3a-cf7f-42a3-af8c-532584c30c20
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- A package contains a component type and a feature group type declaration. Identifiers of these<br />
	-- declaratins are identical to the identifiers imported by alias declarations which do not define<br />
	-- short names for the declarations imported. Bug SC0025.<br />
	PACKAGE TC1<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES FEATURE GROUP pckgId::pckgId::featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId -- bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId -- bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC1;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/02-neg

<p>
	-- Package contains a declaration which defining identifier is identical to the defining identifier<br />
	-- of a component type imported by an alias declaration which renames all declarations of a package.<br />
	-- Bug SC0025.<br />
	PACKAGE TC2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::ALL;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId -- bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC2;</p>

	&nbsp;</p>

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/03-pos
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094

--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- Two declarations with identical defining identifiers are declared in the public section of a package.<br />
	-- All declarations of the package are imported into the local namespace of another package.<br />
	-- No bug SC0025.<br />
	PACKAGE TC3<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::ALL; -- No bug SC0025&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC3;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	-- Two identical declarations in the public section of the package<br />
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/04-neg
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/f8dca427-55be-45ea-8c0b-2f7cb7df0ccd
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1abb93b3-4d16-414c-a91d-fab263b9adb5
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/e2dba0b6-aef6-493a-aef6-8d2531ba6563

--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/84ccd78b-e880-4002-93e6-5d97d1c233d9

--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- Four alias declarations do not declare short names and import the same defining identifier.<br />
	-- Bug SC0025.<br />
	PACKAGE TC4<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId, pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::ALL; -- bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId; -- bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId; -- bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::ALL; -- bug SC0025<br />
	END TC4;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/05-neg
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/f8dca427-55be-45ea-8c0b-2f7cb7df0ccd
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1abb93b3-4d16-414c-a91d-fab263b9adb5
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/e2dba0b6-aef6-493a-aef6-8d2531ba6563
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/79cbe84a-69c9-4e73-97d6-23f06f8f4710
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/9f81b6ee-d435-4158-b51f-5f60c0b1ddd3
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/84ccd78b-e880-4002-93e6-5d97d1c233d9
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/27afcd3a-cf7f-42a3-af8c-532584c30c20
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- An alias declaration defines a short name which is identical to an identifier imported<br />
	-- by an alias declaration which renames all declarations of a package and to the short name<br />
	-- introduced by a package alias declaration. Bug SC0025.<br />
	PACKAGE TC5<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId, pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::ALL;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;threadTypeId RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId; -- bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;threadTypeId RENAMES PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId; -- bug SC0025<br />
	END TC5;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/06-neg
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/f8dca427-55be-45ea-8c0b-2f7cb7df0ccd
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1abb93b3-4d16-414c-a91d-fab263b9adb5
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/e2dba0b6-aef6-493a-aef6-8d2531ba6563
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/79cbe84a-69c9-4e73-97d6-23f06f8f4710
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/9f81b6ee-d435-4158-b51f-5f60c0b1ddd3
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/84ccd78b-e880-4002-93e6-5d97d1c233d9
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/27afcd3a-cf7f-42a3-af8c-532584c30c20
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- A component alias declaration and a package alias declaration define the same short name<br />
	-- identical to the identifier of a component type imported by an alias declaration<br />
	-- which does not declare a short name for the imported component type. Bug SC0025.<br />
	PACKAGE TC6<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId, pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;threadTypeId RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId; -- bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;threadTypeId RENAMES PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId; -- bug SC0025<br />
	END TC6;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/07-pos
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/f8dca427-55be-45ea-8c0b-2f7cb7df0ccd
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1abb93b3-4d16-414c-a91d-fab263b9adb5
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/e2dba0b6-aef6-493a-aef6-8d2531ba6563
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/79cbe84a-69c9-4e73-97d6-23f06f8f4710
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/9f81b6ee-d435-4158-b51f-5f60c0b1ddd3
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/84ccd78b-e880-4002-93e6-5d97d1c233d9
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/27afcd3a-cf7f-42a3-af8c-532584c30c20
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- An alias declaration renames all declarations of a package. The private section<br />
	-- of the referenced package contains a subprogram declaration which defining identifier<br />
	-- is identical to the defining identifiers of declarations from the namespace of the package<br />
	-- which contains the alias declaration. No bug SC0025.<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE TC7<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::ALL;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId -- no bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;subprogramTypeId RENAMES PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId; -- no bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;subprogramTypeId RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId; -- no bug SC0025<br />
	END TC7;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	<br />
	<br />
	&nbsp;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/08-pos
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/f8dca427-55be-45ea-8c0b-2f7cb7df0ccd
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1abb93b3-4d16-414c-a91d-fab263b9adb5
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/e2dba0b6-aef6-493a-aef6-8d2531ba6563
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/79cbe84a-69c9-4e73-97d6-23f06f8f4710
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/9f81b6ee-d435-4158-b51f-5f60c0b1ddd3
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/84ccd78b-e880-4002-93e6-5d97d1c233d9
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/27afcd3a-cf7f-42a3-af8c-532584c30c20
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
<p>
	-- An alias declaration renames all declarations of a package. The public section of the referenced<br />
	-- package contains a component implementation declaration. The same component implementation is<br />
	-- declared in the namespace of the package containing the alias declaration. No bug SC0025.<br />
	PACKAGE TC8<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::ALL;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl -- no bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC8;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/09-pos
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/f8dca427-55be-45ea-8c0b-2f7cb7df0ccd
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1abb93b3-4d16-414c-a91d-fab263b9adb5

--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/84ccd78b-e880-4002-93e6-5d97d1c233d9
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/27afcd3a-cf7f-42a3-af8c-532584c30c20
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- An alias declaration does not define a short name for the referenced component type.<br />
	-- The name of the referenced component type does not exist in the public section of the package<br />
	-- determined by the declaration reference.<br />
	-- The namespace of the package which contains the alias declaration includes a defining identifier<br />
	-- identical to the defining identifier of the imported component declaration. No bug SC0025.<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE TC9<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;declrtnId RENAMES PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId; -- no bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES SUBPROGRAM GROUP pckgId::pckgId::declrtnId;<br />
	END TC9;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/10-pos
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/f8dca427-55be-45ea-8c0b-2f7cb7df0ccd
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1abb93b3-4d16-414c-a91d-fab263b9adb5
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/e2dba0b6-aef6-493a-aef6-8d2531ba6563
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/79cbe84a-69c9-4e73-97d6-23f06f8f4710
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/9f81b6ee-d435-4158-b51f-5f60c0b1ddd3
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/84ccd78b-e880-4002-93e6-5d97d1c233d9
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/27afcd3a-cf7f-42a3-af8c-532584c30c20
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- An alias declaration references a package for which two private sections are defined.<br />
	-- This alias declaration imports a declaration into the local namespace of the containing package.<br />
	-- The alias declaration does not define a short name for the imported declaration, so declaration&#39;s<br />
	-- own name is imported into the local namespace of the containing package.<br />
	-- The containing package defines other declarations which defining identifiers are identical to<br />
	-- the defining identifier of the declaration imported by the alias. No bug SC0025.<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE TC10<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH badPckgId, pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD badPckgId::threadTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;threadTypeId RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId; --&nbsp; no bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;threadTypeId RENAMES PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId; -- no bug SC0025<br />
	END TC10;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	-- Two private sections for the same package<br />
	PACKAGE badPckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; THREAD threadTypeId2<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId2;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br />
	<br />
	END badPckgId;<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE badPckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; THREAD threadTypeId3<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId3;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br />
	END badPckgId;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/11-pos
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/f8dca427-55be-45ea-8c0b-2f7cb7df0ccd
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1abb93b3-4d16-414c-a91d-fab263b9adb5
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/e2dba0b6-aef6-493a-aef6-8d2531ba6563
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/79cbe84a-69c9-4e73-97d6-23f06f8f4710

--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/27afcd3a-cf7f-42a3-af8c-532584c30c20
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- A package contains a component type and a feature group type declaration. Identifiers of these<br />
	-- declaratins are identical to the identifiers imported by alias declarations which do not define<br />
	-- short names for the declarations imported. Two private sections are defined for the package.<br />
	-- No bug SC0025.<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE TC11<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES FEATURE GROUP pckgId::pckgId::featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId -- No bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId -- No bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC11;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE TC11<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE</p>
<p>
	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; THREAD threadTypeId3<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId3; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br />
	END TC11;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; DATA myData</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; END myData;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; FEATURES</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; myFeature : IN DATA PORT myData;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/12-pos
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc

--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
<p>
	-- An alias declaration renames all declarations of a package which does not contain the public section.<br />
	-- No bug SC0025.<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE TC12<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH noPublicSectionPckg;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES noPublicSectionPckg::ALL;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC12;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE noPublicSectionPckg<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	END noPublicSectionPckg;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/13-pos
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc

--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
<p>
	-- Two package all alias declarations are declared.<br />
	-- One of the referenced packages does not contain the public section. No bug SC0025.<br />
	PACKAGE TC13<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId, noPublicSectionPckg;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::ALL; -- No bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES noPublicSectionPckg::ALL; -- No bug SC0025<br />
	END TC13;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE noPublicSectionPckg<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	END noPublicSectionPckg;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/14-neg
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/f8dca427-55be-45ea-8c0b-2f7cb7df0ccd
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1abb93b3-4d16-414c-a91d-fab263b9adb5
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/e2dba0b6-aef6-493a-aef6-8d2531ba6563
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/79cbe84a-69c9-4e73-97d6-23f06f8f4710
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/9f81b6ee-d435-4158-b51f-5f60c0b1ddd3
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/84ccd78b-e880-4002-93e6-5d97d1c233d9
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/27afcd3a-cf7f-42a3-af8c-532584c30c20
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- An alias declaration renames all public component types and feature group<br />
	-- types of a package. Another alias declaration renames a component type of the<br />
	-- same package. It does not declares a new identifier for the renamed component<br />
	-- type, therefore the identifier of the component type is introduced into the<br />
	-- namespace of the containing package.&nbsp; Bug SC0025.<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE TC14<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId; -- Bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::ALL; -- Bug SC0025&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC14;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/15-neg
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/f8dca427-55be-45ea-8c0b-2f7cb7df0ccd
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1abb93b3-4d16-414c-a91d-fab263b9adb5
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/e2dba0b6-aef6-493a-aef6-8d2531ba6563
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/79cbe84a-69c9-4e73-97d6-23f06f8f4710
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/9f81b6ee-d435-4158-b51f-5f60c0b1ddd3
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/84ccd78b-e880-4002-93e6-5d97d1c233d9
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/27afcd3a-cf7f-42a3-af8c-532584c30c20
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- Two identical alias all declarations rename all publicly visible component type<br />
	-- and feature group type declarations of a package. Two identical component alias<br />
	-- declarations rename a component type from the same package as the alias all declarations.<br />
	-- The two component alias declarations does not explicitly declare a new identifier<br />
	-- for the renamed component type, therefore the identifier of this type is intruduced<br />
	-- into the namespace of the containing package. Bug SC0025.<br />
	<br />
	PACKAGE TC15<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId, pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId; -- Bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::ALL; -- Bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeYYY<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeYYY;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId; -- Bug SC0025&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::ALL; -- Bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeXXX<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeXXX;<br />
	END TC15;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/16-neg
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/f8dca427-55be-45ea-8c0b-2f7cb7df0ccd
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1abb93b3-4d16-414c-a91d-fab263b9adb5
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/e2dba0b6-aef6-493a-aef6-8d2531ba6563
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/79cbe84a-69c9-4e73-97d6-23f06f8f4710

--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/27afcd3a-cf7f-42a3-af8c-532584c30c20
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- A package contains only component type and feature group type alias declarations<br />
	-- which do not explicitly declare a new identifier for the referenced declaration.<br />
	-- Three alias declarations are the same, i.e. reference the same declaration.<br />
	-- Bug SC0025.<br />
	PACKAGE TC16<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId; -- Bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::featureGrTypeId; -- No bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId; -- Bug SC0025<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId; -- Bug SC0025&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC16;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0025/17-neg
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/69d16513-f2d7-4b9c-9ff7-7ce423008094
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/00bf13aa-e982-4134-bb22-ef8d45cfe6cc
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/f8dca427-55be-45ea-8c0b-2f7cb7df0ccd
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/1abb93b3-4d16-414c-a91d-fab263b9adb5
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/e2dba0b6-aef6-493a-aef6-8d2531ba6563
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/79cbe84a-69c9-4e73-97d6-23f06f8f4710
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/9f81b6ee-d435-4158-b51f-5f60c0b1ddd3
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/84ccd78b-e880-4002-93e6-5d97d1c233d9
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/27afcd3a-cf7f-42a3-af8c-532584c30c20
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/2645b8c8-18a7-4e80-836c-eb505b541906
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- A lot of alias all declarations are declared in a package. Two of them introduce<br />
	-- into the package namespace identical defining identifiers.<br />
	-- Some of the referenced packages does not declare the public section. Bug SC0025.<br />
	PACKAGE TC17<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgAAA, pckgBBB, pckgId::pckgId, pckgCCC, pckgZZZ,<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId, pckgXXX, pckgYYY;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgAAA::ALL;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgXXX::ALL;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::ALL; -- Bug SC0025.<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgBBB::ALL;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgYYY::ALL;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgCCC::ALL;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::pckgId::ALL; -- Bug SC0025.<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgZZZ::ALL;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC17;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP featureGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END featureGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgAAA<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeAAA<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeAAA;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0026/01-neg
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
-- An alias declaration renames all declarations of the containing package. The public section of<br />
-- the containing package contains a component type declaration. Bug SC0026.<br />
PACKAGE TC1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames TC1::all; -- bug SC0026<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames TC1::all; -- bug SC0026&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
END TC1; 
---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0026/02-pos
-- An alias declaration renames all declarations of the containing package. The public section of<br />
-- the containing package does not contain any component type or feature group type declarations.<br />
-- No bug SC0026.<br />
PACKAGE TC2<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames TC2::all; -- no bug SC0026&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
END TC2; 
---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0026/03-pos
-- An alias declaration is declared in the private section of a package.<br />
-- This alias declaration renames all declarations of the containing package.<br />
-- The package does not contain a public section. No bug SC0026.<br />
PACKAGE TC3<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames TC3::all; -- no bug SC0026&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
END TC3; 
---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0026/04-neg
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
-- An alias declaration renames all declarations of the containing package. The public section of<br />
-- the containing package contains some component type and feature group type<br />
-- declarations. Bug SC0026.<br />
PACKAGE TC4<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames TC4::all; -- bug SC0026<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames TC4::all; -- bug SC0026<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP fGroupType<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END fGroupType;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD GROUP threadGrT<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadGrT;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
END TC4; 
---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0026/05-pos
<p>
	-- An alias declaration renames all declarations of the containing package. The public section of<br />
	-- the containing package contains some component implementation<br />
	-- declarations. No bug SC0026.<br />
	PACKAGE TC5<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH COMPONENT_TYPES;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames TC5::all; -- No bug SC0026<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROCESS IMPLEMENTATION processT.impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;processT.impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROCESSOR IMPLEMENTATION processorT.impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;processorT.impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;renames TC5::all; -- No bug SC0026&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC5;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE COMPONENT_TYPES<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROCESS processT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END processT;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PROCESSOR processorT<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END processorT;<br />
	END COMPONENT_TYPES;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0027/02-neg

END TC2; 
---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0027/03-neg

	-- of a package alias declaration. Bug SC0027.<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id RENAMES PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId; -- bug SC0027<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END id;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC3;</p>

	&nbsp;</p>

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0027/08-neg

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;id RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId; -- bug SC0027<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0027/09-neg
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- A package contains two alias declarations. The component alias declaration does not assign<br />
	-- a short name for the renamed component. The feature group alias declaration does assign<br />
	-- a short name for the renamed feature group. The short name is identical to the name of the<br />
	-- component renamed by the component alias declaration. Bug SC0027.<br />
	PACKAGE TC9<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::threadTypeId; -- bug SC0027<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;threadTypeId RENAMES FEATURE GROUP pckgId::pckgId::fGrTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC9;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP fGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END fGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD GROUP threadGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0027/10-neg
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- An alias declaration renames all declarations of a package and introduces into the local<br />
	-- namespace of the containing package three identifiers which conflict with short names introduced<br />
	-- into the package namespace by other three alias declarations. Bug SC0027.<br />
	PACKAGE TC10<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::ALL; -- 3 bugs SC0027<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;threadTypeId RENAMES PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;fGrTypeId RENAMES FEATURE GROUP pckgId::pckgId::fGrTypeId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;threadGrTypeId RENAMES PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	END TC10;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	PACKAGE pckgId::pckgId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD threadTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;FEATURE GROUP fGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END fGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD GROUP threadGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0027/11-pos
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
<p>
	-- A component alias declaration does not declare a short name for the referenced component.<br />
	-- The referenced component does not exist in the public section of the package determined<br />
	-- by the reference. The package containing the alias declaration declares a declaration<br />
	-- which identifier is identical to the identifier of the component referenced by the alias declaration.<br />
	-- No bug SC0027.<br />
	PACKAGE TC11<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES THREAD pckgId::pckgId::undeclaredId; -- no bug SC0027<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END undeclaredId;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	END TC11;</p>

	&nbsp;</p>

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0027/12-pos
<p>
	-- An alias declaration imports all visible declarations of a package into the local namespace<br />
	-- of the containing package. The public section of the referenced package contains a component<br />
	-- implementaion which defining identifier is identical to the defining identifier of a component<br />
	-- implementation defined in the containing package. No bug SC0027.<br />
	PACKAGE TC12<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WITH pckgId::pckgId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;RENAMES pckgId::pckgId::ALL; -- No bug SC0027<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD IMPLEMENTATION threadTypeId.Impl<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId.Impl;<br />
	END TC12;</p>

	&nbsp;</p>

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />

	-- and feature group types of a package. The containing package declares two identical<br />
	-- component types. The identifier of the component types is identical to the identifier<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadTypeId;<br />

	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;THREAD GROUP threadGrTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END threadGrTypeId;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PRIVATE<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SUBPROGRAM subprogramTypeId<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END subprogramTypeId;<br />
	END pckgId::pckgId;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0028/01-neg
--attr[EXPECTED_RESULT]: INVALID
-- The name of a package alias is identical to the name of the containing package. Bug SC0028.<br />
PACKAGE TC1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; TC1 renames package pack2; -- bug SC0028&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
END TC1;<br />
<br />
PACKAGE pack2<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; THREAD t<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;END t;<br />
END pack2;<br />

---id:   /Requirements/02-Semantic/SC0028/02-pos
-- The name of a package alias is not identical to the name of the containing package. No bug SC0028.<br />
PACKAGE TC2<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;PUBLIC<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;TC2XXX renames package TC2; -- no bug SC0028&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
END TC2; 
---id:   /Requirements/04-Examples/04_2/Aircraft_Cockpit_4_2
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/8c7e6d02-4da8-49ce-b3ab-312b049ec082
<div style="font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); ">
	<p class="ExampleText" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
		<strong>property set</strong>&nbsp;Safety_Properties <strong>is</strong><br />
		&nbsp;&nbsp;Safety_Criticality_Levels&nbsp;: <strong>type enumeration</strong> (low,medium,high);<br />
		&nbsp; Safety_Criticality &nbsp;: Safety_Properties::Safety_Criticality_Levels applies to (<strong>system</strong>);<br />
		<strong>end</strong>&nbsp;Safety_Properties;</p>
	<p class="ExampleText" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
		<span class="CODE"><span lang="EN-US"><strong>package</strong>&nbsp;Avionics::DataTypes</span></span><br />
		<b><span lang="EN-US">public<br />
		&nbsp; data</span></b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;AirData</span><br />
		<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; end</span></b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;AirData;</span><br />
		<b><span lang="EN-US">end</span></b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;Avionics::DataTypes;</span></p>
	<p class="ExampleText" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
		<span class="CODE"><span lang="EN-US"><strong>package</strong>&nbsp;Aircraft::Cockpit</span></span><br />
		<b><span lang="EN-US">public</span></b><br />
		&nbsp; &nbsp;<b>with</b>&nbsp;Avionics::DataTypes, Safety_Properties;<br />
		&nbsp; &nbsp;AirData&nbsp;<b>renames data</b>&nbsp;Avionics::DataTypes::AirData;<br />
		&nbsp; &nbsp;<b>system&nbsp;</b>MFD<br />
		&nbsp; &nbsp;<b>features</b><br />
		&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Airdata:&nbsp;<b>in data port&nbsp;</b>AirData;<br />
		&nbsp; &nbsp;<b>properties</b><br />
		&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Safety_Properties::Safety_Criticality =&gt; high;<br />
		&nbsp; &nbsp;<b>end</b>&nbsp;MFD;<br />
		<strong>end</strong> Aircraft::Cockpit;</p>
</div>

---id:   /Requirements/04-Examples/04_3/TypeExample_4_3
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/9e5f873e-0893-4a94-94d9-ab33c58d416b
<div style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">
	<strong>package</strong> FileSystem<br />
	<strong>public</strong><br />
	<strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong>data</strong></strong>&nbsp;Directory<br />
	<strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong>end</strong></strong>&nbsp;Directory;<br />
	<strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong>data</strong></strong>&nbsp;<strong>implementation</strong> Directory.hashed<br />
	<strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong>end</strong></strong>&nbsp;Directory.hashed;<br />
	<strong>end</strong> FileSystem;<br />
	<br />
	<strong>package</strong> App<br />
	<strong>public</strong><br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong>data</strong> result_type<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong>end</strong> &nbsp;result_type;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong>data</strong> Distance<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong>end</strong> &nbsp;Distance;<br />
	<strong>end</strong> App;<br />
	<br />
	<b>package&nbsp;</b>TypeExample<br />
	<b>public</b><br />
	&nbsp; <strong>with</strong> FileSystem;<br />
	&nbsp; <strong>with</strong> App;<br />
	&nbsp; <b>system</b>&nbsp;File_System<br />
	<b>&nbsp; &nbsp; features</b><br />
	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; -- access to a data component<br />
	<b>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b>root:&nbsp;<b>requires&nbsp;</b><b>data access&nbsp;</b>FileSystem::Directory.hashed;<br />
	<b>&nbsp; end</b>&nbsp;File_System;<br />
	<br />
	<b>&nbsp; process</b>&nbsp;Application<br />
	<b>&nbsp; &nbsp; features</b><br />
	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; -- a data out port<br />
	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; result:&nbsp;<b>out data port</b>&nbsp;App::result_type;<br />
	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; home:&nbsp;<b>requires</b>&nbsp;<b>data access&nbsp;</b>FileSystem::Directory.hashed;<br />
	<b>&nbsp; end</b>&nbsp;Application;<br />
	<br />
	<b>&nbsp; thread</b>&nbsp;Calculate<br />
	<b>&nbsp; &nbsp; prototypes</b><br />
	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; -- A data type to be used as type for the input and result port<br />
	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; data_type:&nbsp;<b>data</b>;<br />
	<b>&nbsp; &nbsp; features</b><br />
	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; input:&nbsp;<b>in data port&nbsp;</b>data_type;<br />
	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; result:&nbsp;<b>out data port&nbsp;</b>data_type;<br />
	&nbsp;&nbsp;<b>end</b>&nbsp;Calculate;<br />
	<br />
	<b>&nbsp; thread</b>&nbsp;Compute_Distance&nbsp;<b>extends</b>&nbsp;Calculate (data_type =&gt;&nbsp;<b>data&nbsp;</b>App::Distance)<br />
	<b>&nbsp; end</b>&nbsp;Compute_Distance;<br />
	<b>end&nbsp;</b>TypeExample;</div>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>

---id:   /Requirements/04-Examples/04_4/ImplementationExample_4_4
--location:  /Documents/As5506-draft2.1-03052012_-_Final.xhtml/db5c6dea-8e25-460b-a45a-221dda37920b
<p class="ExampleText" style="page-break-after: avoid;">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">package </span></b><span lang="EN-US">ImplementationExample</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText" style="page-break-after: avoid;">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">public</span></b></p>
<p class="ExampleText" style="page-break-after: avoid;">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">data</span></b><span lang="EN-US"> Bool_Type</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText" style="page-break-after: avoid;">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">end </span></b><span lang="EN-US">Bool_Type;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText" style="page-break-after: avoid;">
	<span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText" style="page-break-after: avoid;">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">thread </span></b><span lang="EN-US">DriverModeLogic</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">features</span></b></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></b><span lang="EN-US">BreakPedalPressed :<b> in data port </b>Bool_Type;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></b><span lang="EN-US">ClutchPedalPressed :<b> in data port </b>Bool_Type;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></b><span lang="EN-US">Activate :<b> in data port </b>Bool_Type;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></b><span lang="EN-US">Cancel :<b> in data port </b>Bool_Type;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></b><span lang="EN-US">OnNotOff :<b> in data port </b>Bool_Type;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></b><span lang="EN-US">CruiseActive :<b> out data port </b>Bool_Type;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">end </span></b><span lang="EN-US">DriverModeLogic<b>;</b></span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<span lang="EN-US">-- Two implementations whose source texts use different variable names for</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<span lang="EN-US">-- their cruise active port</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">thread implementation </span></b><span lang="EN-US">DriverModeLogic.Simulink</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">properties</span></b></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; </span></b><span lang="EN-US">Dispatch_Protocol=&gt;Periodic;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; Period=&gt; 10 ms;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; Source_Name =&gt; &ldquo;CruiseControlActive&rdquo; <b>applies to </b>CruiseActive;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">end </span></b><span lang="EN-US">DriverModeLogic.Simulink<b>;</b></span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp;</span></b></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">thread implementation </span></b><span lang="EN-US">DriverModeLogic.C</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">properties</span></b></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; </span></b><span lang="EN-US">Dispatch_Protocol=&gt;Periodic;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; Period=&gt; 10 ms;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<span lang="EN-US">&nbsp; Source_Name =&gt; &ldquo;CCActive&rdquo; <b>applies to </b>CruiseActive;</span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">end </span></b><span lang="EN-US">DriverModeLogic.C<b>;</b></span></p>
<p class="ExampleText">
	<b><span lang="EN-US">end </span></b><span lang="EN-US">ImplementationExample;</span></p>
